field.name: summary
field.value: Relation properties private field is not initialised

field.name: description
field.value:
The private field used by the relation properties should be initialised with a constructor
eg.
currently the following code is generated in the Customer class for a relationship with the Order class:
Private _orders As IList(Of Order)
Public Overridable Property Orders() As IList(Of Order) Get Return Me._orders End Get Set Me._orders = value End Set End Property
this ideally should be modified to the following:
Private _orders As IList(Of Order) = new List(Of Order)
Public Overridable Property Orders() As IList(Of Order) Get Return Me._orders End Get Protected Set Me._orders = value End Set End Property
